# M5Gotchi Safe Pet 🐱

## Safe Virtual Pet for M5Cardputer

### Features:
- 🐱 Cute animated cat sprite (3x larger!)
- 💗 Pet status system (Hunger, Happiness, Energy)
- 📊 XP and Level progression
- 📡 WiFi Scanner (passive scan only - NO password saving!)
- 🎮 Simple controls with keyboard
- 🎨 Kawaii pink & cyan theme

### Controls:
- **G** = Menu
- **;** (semicolon) = Up
- **.** (period) = Down  
- **Enter** = Select
- **Space** = Pet action
- **O** = Feed

### Safety:
✅ NO WiFi password saving
✅ NO credential logging
✅ NO pentesting features
✅ NO evil portal
✅ Safe for home use!

### Status Decay:
- Hunger decreases every 30s
- Happiness decreases every 45s
- Energy decreases every 60s

Take care of your virtual pet! 🐾

---

**Security Notice:**
This is the SAFE version without any pentesting capabilities.
For the full pentesting version, see main_cardputer.cpp (use responsibly!).
